title: Koto Practice
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Phew, I think that’s about it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You’re amazing, Dia-chan! The sound of your Koto is so beautiful.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you. Hearing that makes me feel like my daily practice has been worthwhile. But my master’s Koto performance sounds even more beautiful.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That must be so nice, I wonder if playing Koto like this would be fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Would you like to try?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh, may I!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes. Let’s start with a song that even beginners can easily play. Let’s see, how about this one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ah, this is that song! The one that goes “Sakura~ Sakura~”, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, would you like to try this song?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’d love to! Then, this makes you my master, right, Dia-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
